card.name: Safety Link
card.text: You can play Safety Link from your sideboard. Stackless, Passive, Reactive: Tap: Add one colorless essence. (This ability doesn’t use the stack and can be activated during cost payment. You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction. Playing this card or activating this ability doesn’t cost stamina.) A deck list can have any number of cards named Safety Link.

card.name: Peasant Child
card.text: Cost = 1 Essence.

card.name: Peasant
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence.

card.name: Village Militia
card.text: Cost = 5 Essence. Squadron (When this creature enters a battlefield, create a token that’s a copy of it in the same battlefield.)

card.name: Militia Captain
card.text: Cost = 8 Essence. Commander (When this creature enters a battlefield, create a 1/1 creature token with its creature types in the same battlefield.)

card.name: Messenger
card.text: Cost = 4 Essence, 1 Yellow Essence. Scout (Once during each of your turns, this creature can move without becoming tapped. It still has to be tappable.)

card.name: Krakethir Berserker
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 2 Red Essence. Charge (This creature deals excess combat damage to the permanent or player it’s attacking.)

card.name: Krakethir Vindicator
card.text: Cost = 8 Essence, 7 Red Essence. Terror (Creatures can’t block this creature alone.)

card.name: Krakethir Infantry
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 1 Red Essence. Squadron (When this creature enters a battlefield, create a token that’s a copy of it in the same battlefield.)

card.name: Krakethir Trainee
card.text: Cost = 1 Essence, 1 Red Essence.

card.name: Mighty Challenge
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence, 1 Red Essence. Choose target creature you control and target creature in the opposing battlefield to it. They each deal damage equal to their power to the other.

card.name: Crush
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence, 1 Red Essence. Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Krakethir Warbeast
card.text: Cost = 5 Essence, 3 Red Essence. Charge (This creature deals excess combat damage to the permanent or player it’s attacking.)

card.name: Krakethir Bannerman
card.text: Cost = 8 Essence, 4 Red Essence. Leader (When this creature changes battlefields, it may bring another creature you control with it.) Other creatures you control in the same battlefield as Krakethir Bannerman have Terror. (Creatures can’t block this creature alone.)

card.name: Silver Acolyte
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 1 Blue Essence. Silver Acolyte gets +1/+2 as long as you control another Silver in the same battlefield to it.

card.name: Copper Acolyte
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 1 Red Essence. Copper Acolyte gets +1/+2 as long as you control another Copper in the same battlefield to it.

card.name: Gold Acolyte
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 1 Yellow Essence. Gold Acolyte gets +1/+2 as long as you control another Gold in the same battlefield to it.

card.name: Lead Acolyte

card.name: Copper Ingot
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 1 Red Essence. Stackless, Passive, Reactive: Sacrifice Copper Ingot: Add three red essence. Spend this essence only to play Copper cards or activate abilities of Coppers. (This ability doesn’t use the stack and can be activated during cost payment. You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction. Playing this card or activating this ability doesn’t cost stamina.)

card.name: Peasant Escapee
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence. Passive (Playing this card or activating this ability doesn’t cost stamina.)

card.name: Arcane Acceleration
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 2 Blue Essence. Add ten blue essence.

card.name: Finger of Nothing
card.text: Cost = 35 Essence. Finger of Nothing costs an additional 3 stamina to play. When Finger of Nothing enters, destroy all creatures in the opposing battlefield to it.

card.name: Alloyist Renegade
card.text: Cost = 4 Red, Blue, or Yellow Essence. Alloyist Renegade gets +1/+0 for each of a Copper, a Silver, and a Gold that you control.

card.name: Alloyist Mutator
card.text: Cost = 10 Red, Blue, or Yellow Essence. Reactive: Sacrifice a Copper: Search your deck for a Silver card with essence value up to 4 greater than or less than the essence value of the sacrificed Copper. (You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction.) Reactive: Sacrifice a Silver: Search your deck for a Gold card with essence value up to 4 greater than or less than the essence value of the sacrificed Silver. (You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction.) Reactive: Sacrifice a Gold: Search your deck for a Copper card with essence value up to 4 greater than or less than the essence value of the sacrificed Gold. (You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction.)

card.name: Alloyed Link
card.text: Stackless, Passive, Reactive: Tap: Add two colorless essence. (This ability doesn’t use the stack and can be activated during cost payment. You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction. Playing this card or activating this ability doesn’t cost stamina.) Stackless, Passive, Reactive: Tap: Add one red essence, one blue essence, and one yellow essence. Spend this essence only to play artifact objects or activate abilities of artifacts. (This ability doesn’t use the stack and can be activated during cost payment. You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction. Playing this card or activating this ability doesn’t cost stamina.) A deck list can have any number of cards named Alloyed Link.

card.name: Alloyist Fleshsmith
card.text: Cost = 7 Red, Blue, or Yellow Essence. Whenever a creature is put into a discard pile from a battlefield, if an artifact has been put into a discard pile this turn, draw a card. Whenever an artifact is put into a discard pile from a battlefield, if a creature has been put into a discard pile this turn, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Stone of Reaction
card.text: Cost = 4 Essence, 3 Blue Essence. Objects you play and abilities you activate have reactive. (You may play this card or activate this ability as a reaction.)

card.name: Titan of Vesceroth
card.text: Cost = 13 Essence, 7 Blue Essence. Defensive (Whenever this creature attacks, untap it.)

card.name: Krakethir Ambassador
card.text: Cost = 4 Essence, 2 Red Essence. Traveller (This creature can’t gain travel fatigue.)

card.name: Krakethir Messenger
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence, 1 Red Essence. Traveller (This creature can’t gain travel fatigue.) Scout (Once during each of your turns, this creature can move without becoming tapped. It still has to be tappable.)

card.name: Escape
card.text: Cost = 3 Essence, 1 Yellow Essence. Choose target creature you control and target creature in the opposing battlefield to it. The creature you control gains scout until end of turn. Force tap the creature you don’t control and put an exhaustion counter on it. (Once during each of your turns, this creature can move without becoming tapped. It still has to be tappable. If a permanent with an exhaustion counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Revert
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence, 5 Blue Essence. Put target nonlink object into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Preemptive Murder
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence, 2 Blue Essence. Put target creature object into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Cost = 2 Essence, 2 Blue Essence. Put target noncreature nonlink object into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Left Hand's Annihilation
card.text: Cost = 5 Essence, 5 Orange Essence. Destroy all creatures in your left battlefield and each opponent’s right battlefield.

card.name: Right Hand's Annihilation
card.text: Cost = 5 Essence, 5 Orange Essence. Destroy all creatures in your right battlefield and each opponent’s left battlefield.

card.name: Apocalypse
card.text: Cost = 7 Essence, 7 Orange Essence. Destroy all creatures in all battlefields.

card.name: Curse of Death
card.text: Cost = 4 Essence, 2 Purple Essence. Curse creature The cursed creature gets -2/-2.

card.name: Blessing of Life
card.text: Cost = 4 Essence, 2 Green Essence. Bless creature The blessed creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Copper Sanctifier
card.text: Cost = 6 Essence, 3 Red Essence. Whenever Copper Sanctifier deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact in the same battlefield to it or the opposing battlefield to it. Copper Sanctifier gets +2/+1 as long as there are no non-Copper artifacts in the same battlefield as it or in the opposing battlefield to it.

card.name: Gold Sanctifier
card.text: Cost = 6 Essence, 3 Yellow Essence. Whenever Gold Sanctifier deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact in the same battlefield to it or the opposing battlefield to it. Gold Sanctifier gets +2/+1 as long as there are no non-Gold artifacts in the same battlefield as it or in the opposing battlefield to it.

card.name: Silver Sanctifier
card.text: Cost = 6 Essence, 3 Blue Essence. Whenever Silver Sanctifier deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact in the same battlefield to it or the opposing battlefield to it. Silver Sanctifier gets +2/+1 as long as there are no non-Silver artifacts in the same battlefield as it or in the opposing battlefield to it.

card.name: Iron Sanctifier
card.text: Cost = 6 Essence, 3 Green Essence. Whenever Iron Sanctifier deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact in the same battlefield to it or the opposing battlefield to it. Iron Sanctifier gets +2/+1 as long as there are no non-Iron artifacts in the same battlefield as it or in the opposing battlefield to it.

card.name: Lead Sanctifier
card.text: Cost = 6 Essence, 3 Purple Essence. Whenever Lead Sanctifier deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact in the same battlefield to it or the opposing battlefield to it. Lead Sanctifier gets +2/+1 as long as there are no non-Lead artifacts in the same battlefield as it or in the opposing battlefield to it.

card.name: Tin Sanctifier
card.text: Cost = 6 Essence, 3 Orange Essence. Whenever Tin Sanctifier deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact in the same battlefield to it or the opposing battlefield to it. Tin Sanctifier gets +2/+1 as long as there are no non-Tin artifacts in the same battlefield as it or in the opposing battlefield to it.
